snippet: The Federal Reserve’s report, known as the beige book, was a hopeful sign after several troubling economic readings.
abstract: Survey of regional economic conditions in Federal Reserve's 12 districts finds the economy grew moderately in most regions of the country from April 3 through May 25.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve’s report, known as the beige book, was a hopeful sign after several troubling economic readings.

headline.seo: Fed Survey Shows Economy Growing Modestly
headline.main: Fed Survey Shows Economy Growing Modestly
headline.print_headline: Fed Survey Shows Economy Growing Modestly
